name: face_looker
description: Generate AI-powered gaze-tracking face images and create interactive React components that follow the cursor.
readme_summary: The 'face_looker' repository provides tools to generate AI-powered gaze-tracking face images. It offers two methods: using a Replicate model for easy generation and a Python script for advanced customization. The generated images can be used to create interactive React components that follow the cursor, enhancing user engagement in web applications.
key_features: Replicate model integration for one-click image generation
Python script for customized image generation
React hook for creating interactive cursor-following faces
Generation of sprite/grid sheets for optimized image usage
primary_use_case: Creating interactive UI elements, such as engaging portfolio headers and avatars, that respond to cursor movement.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist sitting at a futuristic easel, using a palette of AI algorithms to paint a portrait that seems to follow the viewer's gaze. The portrait's eyes subtly shift to maintain eye contact, creating a captivating effect. Small screens around the easel display code snippets and parameters controlling the gaze direction. The scene is set in a brightly lit studio with a clean, modern aesthetic. Digital particles flow from the artist's brush, shaping the portrait's expression. The repository name 'Face Looker' is subtly displayed on the easel. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.

name: presentation-ai
description: ALLWEONEÂ® Open source AI presentation generator Gamma Alternative. Create professional slides with customizable themes and AI-generated content in minutes.
readme_summary: The repository is an open-source AI presentation generator, inspired by Gamma.app, that allows users to create customizable slides with AI-generated content. It offers features such as AI-powered content generation, customizable themes, real-time generation, and various presentation tools.
primary_use_case: Creating professional presentation slides quickly using AI.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect stands before a digital blueprint, effortlessly transforming abstract ideas into a stunning presentation. The architect uses a special stylus that emits streams of data, instantly creating slides with text and images on the blueprint. Small UI elements display theme options and editable outlines. The scene is set in a bright, modern design studio with soft, diffused lighting. Subtle code snippets float in the background, connecting the creative process to software. The composition is clean and focused with a blue and white color scheme. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography.

name: tufw
readme_summary: Tufw is a Go-based terminal UI for managing ufw (Uncomplicated Firewall) rules. It provides a user-friendly interface to add, edit, and remove firewall rules, especially helpful for those unfamiliar with the command-line ufw tool.
key_features: Add, edit, and remove ufw rules
AUR package available for Arch Linux users
primary_use_case: Simplifying ufw rule management through a terminal-based UI.
cover_image_prompt: A security guard stands before a glowing terminal, adjusting a series of valves and pipes that control the flow of data streams. Each pipe represents a different port, and the valves control the flow of traffic. The guard uses the terminal UI to open or close the valves, visually representing the act of adding or removing firewall rules. Small screens on the terminal display ufw logs and network activity. The scene is set in a futuristic server room with blue and green lighting. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with clear details and a clean composition.

name: laravel-crm
description: Free & Opensource Laravel CRM solution for SMEs and Enterprises for complete customer lifecycle management.
readme_summary: Laravel CRM is an open-source CRM solution built on Laravel and Vue.js, designed for SMEs and enterprises. It offers features for customer lifecycle management, including an admin panel, dashboard, custom attributes, and email parsing.
cover_image_prompt: A gardener tending to a thriving garden, where each plant represents a customer relationship. The gardener uses specialized tools (CRM features) to nurture each plant, ensuring healthy growth and abundant blooms (successful customer interactions). A digital overlay shows data flowing between the gardener's tools and the plants, representing real-time customer data. Small UI elements displaying customer profiles and interaction histories are subtly integrated into the garden landscape. The scene is set in a vibrant, sunlit garden with a clear, focused composition. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: unopim
description: A free and open-source Laravel-based Product Information Management (PIM) system that helps businesses organize, manage, and enrich their product data from a single, central platform. Learn how UnoPIM scales to handle over 10 million products:  https://unopim.com/scaling-unopim-for-10-million-products/
readme_summary: UnoPim is an open-source Product Information Management (PIM) system built on the Laravel framework. It helps businesses organize, manage, and enrich their product information in one central repository. Key features include centralized product management, data enrichment, AI-powered content generation, and API integration.
key_features: Magic AI for Product Content Generation
primary_use_case: Organizing, managing, and enriching product information in a central repository.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a master gardener tending to a vast orchard, where each tree represents a different product. The gardener uses a magical watering can that enriches the soil with data, causing the fruits (product information) to grow larger and more vibrant. A nearby AI assistant provides suggestions for optimal growth, displayed on a small, glowing screen. Subtle UI elements float around the orchard, showing product attributes and categories. The scene is bathed in warm, golden light, creating a sense of abundance and organization. The composition is wide and inviting, showcasing the scale of the orchard. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: HeadlessX
description: A lightweight, self-hosted headless browser automation platform. Designed as an alternative to Browserless, built for speed, privacy, and scalability.
readme_summary: HeadlessX is a self-hosted headless browser automation platform designed as an alternative to Browserless. It focuses on speed, privacy, and scalability, offering advanced anti-detection capabilities and human-like behavioral simulation for web scraping and automation tasks. Version 1.3.0 includes features like canvas fingerprinting control, WebGL spoofing, and Bezier mouse movement.
key_features: Advanced Anti-Detection Engine (Canvas/WebGL/Audio spoofing, WebRTC leak prevention, Hardware Fingerprint Spoofing)
Human-like Behavioral Simulation (Bezier Mouse Movement, Keyboard Dynamics, Natural Scroll Patterns)
primary_use_case: Web scraping and browser automation with a focus on anti-detection and human-like behavior simulation.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled detective wearing a high-tech visor carefully navigates a complex web of interconnected servers, extracting valuable data with precision. The detective uses advanced tools to bypass security measures, leaving no trace behind. Small UI elements on the visor display real-time data streams and anti-detection metrics. The scene is set in a futuristic data center with glowing cables and digital particles swirling around. The repository name, 'HeadlessX,' is subtly displayed on a server rack. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.
